extendedInfo.description: The best way to read breaking views and news from Firstpostâs exclusively digital newsroom. This app is free to download and includes by-the minute news, views and analysis around news and current affairs in India and the world.Navigate through front page stories, photos, videos and track live copy across a wide array of categories including politics, world, business, economy, investing, living, ideas, bollywood and sports. Our writers based across the globe bring you a fresh, new perspective of the critical issues that frame India and the world today. With a single touch you can share the story you like through facebook, twitter or email and comment on any post.You can also- customize the frontpage- Search for articles- Save to read later- and look at our archive over seven days

reviews.title: App ignored by the developers
reviews.comment: The news isn\'t loading from the last 4 days. Being a news app, its only function is to show news. If it can\'t do its basic function and that too for 4 days, it speaks a lot about the care taken by its developers.
reviews.author: Vinay Shekhar

reviews.title: Needs a lot of improvement
reviews.comment: As an avid fan of the website expected more from the app. Slow to load and often fails to even on 3G network. News Refresh rate is too low. UI is clunky. Worse too man  y ads which interferes with the content. The homepage shortcut often gets deleted by itself.
reviews.author: Harikrishnan B

reviews.title: Needs improvements
reviews.comment: Content is fine. But mo option to disable push alerts, goes to the main page after clicking kn the push alert notification and since last 3 days the page is not updating. Uninstalling now, will reinstall when fixed.
reviews.author: Vivek Jain

reviews.title: Need share button
reviews.comment: Nice app. But 4 stars, since some essential stuff like a share button to share articles on social media is missing.
reviews.author: Pradyumna Murhar

reviews.title: Crisp design. Pesky alerts. Crawling splash screen.
reviews.comment: Great app design with a crispness that is to be expected of First Post. But it takes over my phone with breaking news alerts. So until you behave yourselves, it\'s only 3 stars. Also, what with the splash screen that takes forever? I want to get to the news N-O-W!
reviews.author: Mahesh Shantaram

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: The UI is nothing special. Content loads slower than mobile website. Not much going on here. Stick to the website.
reviews.author: Akshat Joshi

reviews.title: Intrusive advertising
reviews.comment: Your Line advts at the bottom of page is very intrusive. Many times when scrolling down my finger gkes to \"line\" ad, it straightaway opens the browser and starts downloading the app. This us really a shame
reviews.author: Vivek Bhat

reviews.title: Not loading breaking news link
reviews.comment: App highlights breaking news in notification window. But on selecting the highlighted notification, it opens website ,not opening the breaking news link(highlighted news not shown).
reviews.author: premchand jodukallu

reviews.title: Can be improved
reviews.comment: The UI matches well with FP\'s clean web look.The notifications don\'t lead to the articles, they just land the reader on the front page, start up time is a little more and I don\'t see any method to stop notifications.
reviews.author: Siddhit Sanghavi

reviews.title: Breaking news feature has defect
reviews.comment: Good app but breaking news if you click on it opens my page but I nither can see breaking news nor read it so whats the point if breaking news check ndtv app much better
reviews.author: Amolakh Nath Segal

reviews.comment: Great very easy to get alll news
reviews.author: jigar dholakiya

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Uninstalling the current version as it does not give me an option to disable push notifications which is a very annoying feature! Also, the UI is all crammed up and could do with a bit more refining.
reviews.author: Yashwanth Reddy

reviews.title: Keeps running in background
reviews.comment: The app was fine before the latest update. Now it keeps running in background and delivers breaking news in notification bar. This is not just annoying but also hogs ram unnecessary. And there is no option to turn it off.
reviews.author: Azhar S

reviews.title: VeryVery stupid app
reviews.comment: The click on the notification just takes to the home page without loading the specific article. And there are more than 15 article notifications in a day. Frustrating!!! Stopping all notifications at present
reviews.author: Rajdeep Singh

reviews.title: Annoying update
reviews.comment: Excellent app till recent update. Flooded with notifications, often in duplicate. No option to disable notifications. Uninstalling the app. Let me know when you rectify this. May install again.
reviews.author: Vishal Saxena

reviews.title: Need commenting as well..
reviews.comment: Need commenting to make this more attractive and interactive as well.

reviews.title: Stale news
reviews.comment: The news pages haven\'t refreshed since the time I have installed this app. I get news alerts but selecting it takes me back to the stale news page.. Uninstalling it for now.. Expect first post to fix this issue asap..
reviews.author: Vikas Gautam

reviews.title: Push notifications dont work
reviews.comment: I get the notifications but what\'s The point of it when o click them that article doesn\'t open. It only opens the home page
reviews.author: Rohan Savant

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It was the bast app of the world
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the notifications please
reviews.comment: Upon clicking the breaking news notification, the app opens up on the homepage and not on the article page.
reviews.author: Ravikiran Vadlamudi
